hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Dialogs

Class AbstractNumberPickerDialogPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • android.preference.DialogPreference
        • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Dialogs.AbstractNumberPickerDialogPreference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.preference.PreferenceManager.OnActivityDestroyListener, java.lang.Comparable<android.preference.Preference>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeasureTimeNumberPickerDialogPreference, MicrophoneSensitivityNumberPickerDialogPreference

    public abstract class AbstractNumberPickerDialogPreference
extends android.preference.DialogPreference
    Abstract class for number picker dialogs.
